segments.text: Susan , good evening.Why are you so dressed up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm on my way out to a New Year's banquet.How do I look ? Is my make-up ok ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You look great.Your make-up is perfect .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do your think I should wear a different dress ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , the one you have on looks fabulous , especially with your hair like that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks for saying.Do you have any ideas which necklace I should wear ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: With that dress I'd like to say your white diamond necklace would look perfect .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks for helping out.Now Im ready , what are you doing tonight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not much , Just a house party with some friends .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , most of the people are from my office .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds like I'm missing out on a good time.Oh , well , there's always next year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sure you will have fun no matter where you go.Remember to take your bag .
segments.speaker: S1
